caption.p: Characteristics of patients with Colchicine treatment before COVID-19 diagnosis.

tr.td: Arterial hypertension treated with enalapril 10 mg/day
Subjective fever and headache during 5 days
68-Year-old aunt who lived with her, with arterial hypertension. She died in the ICU due to ARDS and multi-system failure
2 weeks before diagnosis and 1 week after
Headache during 3 days and dry cough without dyspnea
45-Year-old sister hospitalized for dyspnea, did not require an ICU. 25-year-old cousin with mild cough and headache
Headache during 5 days and mild cough
Husband with headache and dry cough. Children of 14 and 19 years old were asymptomatic
Dry cough without dyspnea. Myalgias during 5 days
56-Year-old cousin died. She does not live with her but has close contact (birthday celebration)
Nonspecific arthralgias, subjective fever, and odynophagia
86-Year-old grandmother who lived with her, with arterial hypertension died

fn.p: Kg: kilograms; mg: milligrams; mcg: micrograms; ARDS: acute respiratory distress syndrome; ICU: intensive care unit.
